links_reviews_title: A little tight up top, but so cute!
links_reviews_text: I loved these. So much personality! Definitely size up one! They're extremely long too, so be aware if you're shorter!
I love these and will hopefully buy them at some point. The were so comfy and fun. They fit me great and I loved them with an old tucked in t shirt.

loved these jeans! i wear a lot of BDG jeans in a 32. I sized down to a 31 based on reviews and the waist was still too big on me. I'd probably size down one more time for a better waist fit if I were to re-rent!

Loved them So much but they were just SO LONG.

I am a standard size 28 in every single denim brand I’ve had, and this one is loose on the waist and hip. If you’re not super curvy you should have no problem wearing it comfortably. I’m planning to purchase it and have the waist tucked in.

links_reviews_text: These jeans are great, I got my usual size and they fit great. They are super flattering along the waist and the wide leg is not too exaggerated which I liked. I must note that these are super long, I wore them with a small heel and it was fine.

The fabric of this dress is beautiful and the overall fit is amazing. I love this dress but could not wear it outside. If you have a big booty like me, size up by 2 sizes because this dress is short in the front.

links_reviews_text: Waist elastic hit halfway between the bottom of my bra and my natural waist and wouldn't stay put.

links_reviews_title: Love the look, not the length
links_reviews_text: Very cute. Fit on top, but I have long legs and it too short to wear.
This dress was pretty short on me but still long enough to keep me covered so I was a big fan! Definitely good for weekends and times you’re not afraid to show a little extra leg.

I really love this dress! It's gorgeous, and the material is perfect. I was so disappointed that it didn't fit. I can usually wear a small in most things, but this was tiny. Still great! Just be aware that it runs small.

Wayyyyy too short and I’m a short chick! Bummed really liked the dress

This dress is amazing in theory but it is so oddly proportioned.
I love this dress but I couldn’t wear it because it was way too short.
This is a fabulous dress I just wish I went up a size because it was too short. Fit more like a shirt and i'm only 5'4.

This was such a fun going out party dress! It was definitely short but since I’m 5’ tall it was the perfect length for what I was going for. I had to safety pin the front as it was a little too revealing, but worked out great once it was pinned. Would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty short in the front but I'm short so it was fine

Didn't end up with an opportunity to wear this, but I loved it and may put in my box again. It was very short and would require tights or leggings or to be worn over something.

Not a good fit for me! I wanted to wear this as a vacation dress, but it's more of a beach cover up. And does not have that loose breezy look like it appears in photos. Will not be taking on my trip with me!

links_reviews_title: Very cute with lots of personality
links_reviews_text: Never wore it but really liked it when I tried it on. Fit well for large bust but needed double stick tape to stay put

So much nicer in person. The shiny threads in addition to the frilly-ness of the dress make the light hit it in all the right places. Love the length--I'm kinda short, but I didnt' feel uncomfortable in it wearing it on a night out. Get it!

I love this dress! It was a little big but i was still able to wear it. If I would have gotten a smaller size, it would have been to short.

links_reviews_title: Cute but so short in front
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress on my 30th birthday trip to Napa! it was so cute and I love short dresses but it was way too short in the front! yikes

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, looks better on the model, very short
links_reviews_text: This dress looks great on the model, and might be more of a me issue but I wanted it to look the same on me? Truly gorgeous dress. I wish it would have worked out, it was just SO short.

Wore it once but was perfect for the event I got it for! Had many compliments and I felt super fun and flirty. Fabric is great. V is pretty low so I wore something under it. A little short but it was night and dark out so I figured what the hell!

This is absolutely not a dress for anyone over 5'2/5'3. I'm 5'4 and it barely covered parts I wouldn't want shown! I wore it with skinny denim as a blouse instead, super cute! I did need to safety pin the top to make it more PG-13, but overall really pretty! Just incredibly short.
I really like this dress and it fit well but it was VERY short on me (and I'm only 5'3). It would work well with leggings and boots in the fall.

links_reviews_title: Can I wear this everyday, please!?
links_reviews_text: Wish I never had to take it off! I thought I might get a fancy date night opportunity, but I ended up wearing it to work a wedding. I got so many compliments and I felt like a stunner. I had planned on wearing it with black high heel ankle boots for an edge, but wore black Rothy’s for work. It is definitely meant to show off your legs, but I was amazed at how comfortable I felt considering it is pretty short. It’s cut longer in the back, so although you’re getting all your leg out there, it doesn’t feel like your bum is going to make an appearance. The cut in the front with the wrap style somehow keeps everything covered; it felt like a miracle dress. The sleeves have elastic that really add to the fun & functionality. I did use the double sided tape to keep things contained up top, but I wouldn’t been worried about it if it wasn’t a work function where I had to bend over a lot. Also, the fabric is very soft and silky! I thought for sure the silver threads were going to make it super itchy. Hoping this is available to rent forever, cause I just didn’t wanna shell out the cash... TL;DR: perfect for a snazzy night, particularly amazing on a petite or short waisted frame. BE PREPARED TO FEEL AMAZING.

links_reviews_title: Dress it up, or dress it down!

links_reviews_title: Super cute, short on tall women
links_reviews_text: super cute dress! the sizing felt small in terms of length - like the sleeves are short for a woman my height and the dress hem fell JUST below my butt.... very sexy for going out but a little risqué for work or daytime.

This dress is really cute on the hanger but is kind of hard to wear. I tried it on and like the look, but the skirt is really short and the slip underneath shows when I walk or move. wore on date night. used the boob tape nuuly provides to keep in place and it worked so well. super pretty and flattering. material is shinier in real life.

I love this dress, unfortunately, I am 5' 8" and it is super short. It could work for a party or club but not for what I had in mind. Beautiful and great quality, would be best for somebody on the shorter side.

Unfortunately, this dress did not look as good on me as it did on the model! It was way too short and a bit too tight. I didn't get to wear it. I still think it's super cute just not the right fit for me!

Looks really strange on. Got a medium and it fit very weirdly. Too tight in the waist, too big on the top, too short in the front. Beautiful fabric but I wouldn't wear it out because of how short it was and I am very short!
Looks beautiful on model but wasn’t crazy about it on me. The top is so open that I would have to wear a shirt under and I don’t want to ruin the design. The sleeves are also very big on.
Really cute dress but SUPER short. The back is fine but the front wrap comes up higher so if you’re not careful you’ll def flash someone!
There is no way this can be categorized as a dress at all, I would barely consider it a bathing suit cover up. I'm 5'6 and didn't stand a chance to wear this out of my room. Print is cute.

I absolutely loved this dress when I first got it but once I tried it on, the front portion of the dress came up too short for me to feel comfortable enough to wear this out. Better suited for shorter gals!

This dress was beautiful and well made, unfortunately the location of the front slit exposed the undies and was a few inches too short. I think if it was sewn together further down it would be perfect, and may be better suited on someone with a shorter torso!
This dress is so cute and comfy!! The fabric is sleek and soft. It does have a little shimmer to it, it’s hard to tell in the photos.
Loved this dress, super pretty fabric that shines and shimmers. Unfortunately it was way too short. Could maybe have been worn as a tunic?

This dress is super cute and even better in person. The fabric has an awesome sheen to it and its a super flattering cut. Definitely try this one out!
Great fringe, great fit. Maybe too trendy for me? Loved the concept but I can’t walk around in fringed denim in LA!
So fun. Rent it!

So many compliments from men and women!! Has a great vintage vibe. Fun jacket for Rodeo season, just wish I could have worn it more.

Obsessed with this jacket. It made me feel happy, free and a little mysterious. The fringe is dangerously long, gets caught in doors etc if you're not careful but it is worth it! Wore this with bodysuits/jeans. long skirts and a dress.

AMAZING. So fun, made me feel so confident. Looked really good with a basic pair of white jeans and a black tank, to let the jacket shine. Definitely recommend! Only one star down bc it's not super practical, but a perfect rental piece.

I wore this to a festival! Loved it

This jacket is amazing. So fun and I got tons of compliments. May rent again!
Didn't end up wearing this bc it was super big

I have a feeling I am going to end up buying this because it looks great with flowy dresses and skirts. And all of my friends and family have said, "I can't believe you don't already own this!"

links_reviews_title: Feelin' like a rockstar in this jacket.
links_reviews_text: I've always liked the fringe look, but never wanted to actually commit to buying one because I wasn't sure if I could pull it off. I got compliments from friends AND strangers whenever I wore this jacket out, dressed down or up! Sometimes jackets are a bit tight in the shoulder area for me, but this one fit true to size and I could move my arms all around without feeling restricted by the denim.
Great jacket! I love fringe but never want to make the commitment to actually buy a fringe jacket, so this worked out perfectly!
Great fringe, great fit. Maybe too trendy for me? Loved the concept but I can’t walk around in fringed denim in LA!
So fun. Rent it!

I loved this jacket! The fit is so flattering and the fringe is so so fun. I got so many compliments on it. The fringe is very long so it’s not the type of thing I’d wear as a daily jacket, but I did wear it a few times for fun occasions. Will probably rent again in the future!
So many compliments from men and women!! Has a great vintage vibe. Fun jacket for Rodeo season, just wish I could have worn it more.

Obsessed with this jacket. It made me feel happy, free and a little mysterious. The fringe is dangerously long, gets caught in doors etc if you're not careful but it is worth it! Wore this with bodysuits/jeans. long skirts and a dress.

AMAZING. So fun, made me feel so confident. Looked really good with a basic pair of white jeans and a black tank, to let the jacket shine. Definitely recommend! Only one star down bc it's not super practical, but a perfect rental piece.
LOVED this jacket - it was a little larger than expected but it didn't matter, still was a great piece. Got a ton of compliments.
Fit great, was one of my favorite looks this month. I wore with a slip skirt and lacy top - I got so many compliments!
I loved this jacket so much, only didst purchase because it was a little TOO flashy to wear often. If I was more bold I would've purchased in a heart beat.
Awesome statement jacket. I wish I owned it
Got this to wear in Nashville and it was PERFECT!!!! Picture says it all. Can't say enough about this thing, perfect item to rent though I don't know when I would wear it again
Wore this every other day and received so many compliments. The fit is true and a little cropped which enhanced the fringe detailing even more. It was a little bit extra in all the right ways.

Obsessed with this jacket. I got compliments every time I wore it. Not very practical for everyday wear, but fun for nights out. I found myself sometimes getting caught on things because of the fringe, but what can you do (reason for -1 star). It’s not something I’d ever buy so I’m happy I got to try it out with Nuuly! It’s a relaxed fit, so I’d say order your true size.
I wore this to a festival! Loved it

This jacket was kind of annoying! It got caught in everything - the purse I carried, car doors, under people sitting next to me. It’s cute and is certainly a conversation starter, but felt a little too much like a hassle, so I ended up wearing less than originally planned. The XS was still boxy on me. 5 stars for still being cute and great darker black.
This jacket is awesome. The fringe is amazing but a bit cumbersome if you’re going in and out of a car, carrying a large bag. Will rent again!
Wore for a theme party, so would not have in my regular rotation, hence the 3. If you are heavy into the festival circuit, this might be perfect for you!
Loved wearing this around LA- got so many compliments! The fringe is pretty long so its definitely a statement. Perfect rental piece
This jacket is amazing. So fun and I got tons of compliments. May rent again!
Didn't end up wearing this bc it was super big
I am absolutely obsessed with this jacket. I wanted to purchase it but it would be unrealistic with Florida weather. I will definitely rent again for when I go to cooler weather places!

I loved this. My go-to is always a black denim jacket, so this was stepping just a liiittle outside my comfort zone without going too crazy. I wore this out to bars in NYC and got so many compliments. If you live anywhere besides NYC or LA you might not be able to get away with this on a regular night out, but it would be perfect for a music festival!! I honestly wish I had more opportunities to wear this, it's so cool without being over the top. Fits true to size!
I loved it so much I bought it

This is my favorite piece that I have ever rented from Nuuly! This is an oversized jacket so it has a loose look to it. I am between a medium and a large and went with the large. Happy that I did. I got so many compliments on this and it would be perfect for any western activities or Rodeo. I wore this all the time.
I felt so cool wearing this jacket, so many compliments and can be worn in different settings!

links_reviews_title: I didn't expect to like this as much as I did.
links_reviews_text: This was sent to me as a replacement for another jacket that ended up out of stock. At first I was annoyed because I'm not really in to fringe, and this is a little extreme. I got it and I was shocked, I wore it with an LBD, with black leggings and a sports bra, and over a black sweater that needed some excitement. It's not as dramatic as the photos look, especially from the front. Super cute!

I love this jacket so much! I'm buying it so I can wear it year round. Looks great with black or light wash jeans. Fits perfectly around the shoulders and the arms are the right length. Denim isn't too stiff, just right.

links_reviews_title: Never had a chance to wear it but bought it anyway
links_reviews_text: This jacket is super cool looking and very comfortable. I never had a chance to wear it out during the month I had it, but I ended up buying it because I love it! It's super cute and looks very trendy. It is a bit on the large side, but I like it! If you want a more fitted and cropped look like the model, I would size down.
Adorable but gets caught on everything.

I wore this 4 times then decided I had to have it. I wore it with a pair of velvet bellbottom pants and a lighter black denim pair of bellbottoms. Got a bazillion compliments. It does run a little large since the XS fit me. I would say size down by one size.
Wore it in Joshua Tree National Park, it is a super cool jacket. Loved the feel of the denim. The Fringe does get a little tangled though!

I ADORE this jacket and was the most excited to rent this, but it was hard to match with things I own. It was a very washed black so it was hard to pair with other blacks, and the waist did not hit me in the most flattering place--it would have been better a little shorter or a little longer. Still a fun jacket and I'm glad I got to wear it a few times.

It's a bit oversized, so the XS fit me perfectly. Very cool twist on the classic black jacket. Wore this with everything - high waisted jeans, high waisted skirts, and over dresses. Another item on the Xmas list!

This is my favorite piece from my box this month. The fit is perfection (a little bit roomy which is exactly what I want from a denim jacket). I love, love loved how many different ways I was able to style it and I got compliments EVERYWHERE I went. Pair it with a cute pair of ankle booties, a dress/jumpsuit/jeans and a tee and immediately upgrade your look. The fringe was a little tangled when my box arrived and I was worried it would be an issue but it stayed tangle-free through all my wears.

Fun, but not obsessed. I wish it was more of a wide cropped vintage style versus like a boyfriend trucker style if that makes sense. The sleeves were slim which is a bad quality in a denim jacket IMO. The fringe was sorta hard to manage at times and got stuck in doors etc
Wore this jacket to a country concert and had to buy it after, it is so much fun to wear!
Felt like a 70s goddess with that fringe!
Too boxy for a curvy gal like me. Also, the fringe was kinda thin so it was really curly and bent
It honestly looked like something I bought for Coachella and tried to wear again. The fringe was kinda nuts and not my look.

Loved this jacket! It was a snug small, but still felt pretty true to size. Surprisingly the fringe did not get in the way of everyday movement, but it certainly will not layer under a real jacket. Felt very boho cowgirl in it, would rent again!

I wish they made this jacket a bit smaller. I did receive compliments and questions each time I wore it, but it was definitely a little big on me. I wish the sides wouldn't flare out so much and would sit tighter around my body. Really cool jacket, just wish it were smaller.

I loved this jacket! I would have bought it, but just didn't think I would get enough use out of it for the price. This jacket definitely fits over sized, but in a good way! I got lots of compliments on this and would highly recommend it, especially for an occasion where you want a statement piece.
Super cute jacket for an event. The tassels are a bit too long to comfortably wear all day. But loved!
I love this jacket. It's so unique and so fun. I felt like a total baddie every time I wore it. I'm usually a M/L and I got the M and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but runs very small
links_reviews_text: Shoulders are really narrow, but the rest of the body fit as expected.
Literally OBSESSED with this jacket. Got so many compliments. Runs slightly large so get a smaller size but SO cute, definitely a must.

This jacket is amazing! I found myself reaching for it time and time again- it has its way of making an outfit. I wore it to a concert outside, and it was perfect and I got so many compliments. The crop is super flattering, and the fringe is sturdy. I got my normal size, and it fit perfectly. I was sad to send it back, I'm still thinking of buying it!
Super comfortable and fitted without being too structured and uncomfortable. Wore it in Austin for a bachelorette party and it was perfect!

I wore this way more then i expected to when i rented it - from the office to a concert to a night out. I put it with everything from a band tee to a white work blouse and it worked. If you love fringe...rent this! A nice swap in for your regular jean jacket. Only FYI to pass is that i usually wear a M in jackets and got a S and it fit perfectly so size down!

I read the reviews and rented an XS when I saw this ran a little large. It was a good move since this ended up fitting me perfectly. While I agree w/ the other reviews about the fringe being tricky, I LOVE this jacket. The second I put it on, I knew I had to have it. Yes, I ended up keeping it. I love the fringe look and had been wanting one for a while, and a black one like this from Levis will be a classic always.
I was really excited about this piece but once I got it it was very hard to style, super bummed about it
It's a cool jacket and fits well, but the fringe is reeeeally long
Love it, so cute, such a fun style statement!!
Best denim jacket ever! Nice fit. Got so many compliments whenever I wore it!

links_reviews_title: Statement making jacket but not for the clutzy
links_reviews_text: I got a compliment multiple times when I wore this jacket. Definitely would think of purchasing if I didn't catch the fringe on almost everything I encountered. The cut is great and the fringe is beautiful and sturdy. Would recommend for those that move a bit slower in life :-)
Only tried it on and loved it. Was too hot to wear but on my radar for when it is cooler.

Wore this to a Friday the 13th event for work and got tons of compliments then wore it again for a Kacey Musgraves concert with my AA disco shorts and a cow print bandeau and cowboy boots and people were falling over themselves to tell me they loved my outfit and the jacket!! Super cool, super fun piece that fit really well and was super well-made. SO impressed by it. Wish I had gotten a better photo of all the fringe but in my pic you can see how well it fits.
Will probably get this again
Fell in love with this jacket but had trouble making it work for every day. Definitely a special occasion type piece. Still, so fun and different.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! But hard to outfit
links_reviews_text: Fell in love with this as soon as I saw it! I loved the fit, and felt very cool wearing it. I did find it a little difficult to outfit, however.

This was so much fun to wear!! I wore it a couple times and got so many compliments! But the fringes are reallyyy long and the size is a bit large, so it was a bit difficult to go to the bathroom and wash my hands haha. If they had a smaller size or I was bigger I definitely would buy it though! This jacket will make you want to spin and jump around!
really cute but fringe was kinda annoying

Absolutely am going to have to add this to my permanent wardrobe. Every time I wore it I received compliments. Runs oversized, and would be perfect in the fall with a chunky sweater. Can’t recommend enough.

I loved this jacket! I only wish I could've worn it more, but it isn't quite cold enough yet. The fringe is long, the fit is a bit larger, it's very comfortable. It's definitely a statement jacket. I will be ordering it again!

links_reviews_title: Is it possible to love a jacket too much?
links_reviews_text: I often struggle with Levi's because the jackets tend to be too short in the arms and tight in the bust for me! But I love anything fringed, so I had to take a risk. The size M fit me like a dream, landing slightly below my natural waist with a just-the-right-amount relaxed fit. The arms were the perfect length. My torso is on the shorter side, so this might be slightly cropped on a longer gal. The fabric is super soft and the fringe is durable. I have a feeling I am going to end up buying this because it looks great with flowy dresses and skirts. And all of my friends and family have said, "I can't believe you don't already own this!"

links_reviews_title: Feelin' like a rockstar in this jacket.
links_reviews_text: I've always liked the fringe look, but never wanted to actually commit to buying one because I wasn't sure if I could pull it off. Great jacket! I love fringe but never want to make the commitment to actually buy a fringe jacket, so this worked out perfectly!
The fringe was kind of stiff on it, and it didn’t really hang how I wanted it to on me

links_reviews_title: oops-rented during shelter in place! too bad!
links_reviews_text: I rented right before SF got put on shelter in place, so I don't see a chance to wear this. It is super cute! Heavy as they say, and maybe size down one size. I am usually a medium on top, though sometimes large, and medium was the right size! Supper funky and fab to rent!

links_reviews_title: Fun, fringey jacket for the win
links_reviews_text: This jacket was a great addition to spice up any outfit. The fringe is fun and sassy. Size down...I almost always wear a medium but read the reviews and got a small. Perfect fit and a great piece for the Winter-Spring fashion transition. Loved it!
Definitely have to play around with this piece. Rather large, but got lots of compliments.
This jacket is super fun! It does run large so be aware of that. I got a small and it was the right size.
I liked the idea of this jacket but it didn’t fit me at all.. It was too big, too bulky, too heavy just NOT right.
The perfect statement piece. I paired with super fitted/true to size items to balance the oversized look, and loved it!
This is the cutest jacket. I got a million compliments on it, so I just had to buy it and keep it forever. Thanks!!

Loved this jacket! Definitely oversized, but can be cute with sleeves cuffed. I wore this item twice as it’s a bit hard to fit under coats during NYC winters, but always received a ton of compliments. Loved it with some high waisted jeans and statement shoes.
Of course this is adorable on the model. In a size large it is the bulkiest most uncomfortable jacket. It’s so heavy! The fringe didn’t sit nice because it was so chunky.
I love the idea but it was too big and too heavy for me, tried to pair it with something but it looked too much every time.
This jacket runs oversized (I normally have the opposite issue). I have a large bust. I really wish I ordered a size small because this jacket is so cute.

This is an extremely cool jacket. It’s very heavy and good quality, would be cool for some outdoor party or something. I never ended up wearing it but wish I had the right occasion to! I hopefully will rent again and actually wear it next time.
This definitely didn't button on me but I like a denim jacket to fit on the smaller size. This jacket is very heavy. But so dope.

I wore this to a concert with a graphic tee, tie dye bias midi skirt and rancher hat. It was the perfect boho meets western look and I got a ton of compliments! This may be a future purchase of mine to keep!
I wanted to love this jacket (even ordered it with a similar white sun dress as pictured) but it ultimately was too big and heavy. Definitely size down!
Clearly a nice piece, but even though it was supposed to be big, it was WAY too oversized. Definitely size down!
I really wanted this to work, but I was hoping to wear it without the belt, and that wasn't easy. I love oversized stuff and this was massive. I wished it was slightly longer and a lot slimmer.
I wish I had kept this. I loved this jacket. It was comfortable and super functional. great pockets. The denim was nice and broken in too.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to wear alone or as a laying piece...
links_reviews_text: Your traditional Levi's denim quality with an over-sized fit. I suggest ordering a size smaller than your usual. Fantastic buttoned with the belt cinched over leather tights... or open over a flowy dress!
Fit is very oversized but belted tightly works for even a small frame like mine. Think I have to own this one
I wore this with leggings, black jeans.. even sweatpants. Hahaha I loved it so much. It is oversized, but still a flattering fit with the belted waist.
Runs so big, got the XS but needed two sizes down from that. If you’re going for an oversized fit it could be cute but would recommend sizing down if you can.
Rented this twice. Wore it a lot on my trip to Joshua tree there's so many ways to style it! Definitely considering buying it!
I love the long denim jacket look. This definitely ran a little large, but I wore it anyway. I felt like it added a lot to simple leggings, sneakers outfits. Would recommend for sure.
Loved this I styled it in many different ways. I could have used an XS but I made the S work. Loved wearing it with a belt bag and biker shorts and booties!

This jacket definitely runs large. I typically like very fitted jackets but wanted to branch out with this one, however,this came much larger than what it looks like in the picture. The picture makes it look cinched somehow but I never got it to look quite like that. I ended up pulling the straps towards the back and knotting them behind me which really made the jacket look more fitted. That limited my range of arm motion but I thought it was better this way than looking so big. Overall, enjoyed this jacket because it's so different then what I normally wear!

links_reviews_title: If you’re looking for oversized denim this is a great pick.
links_reviews_text: Runs very large. I wore this with leggings and skinny jeans and loved this look with the belted waist.
Ok, if you like oversized, this fits the bill. I should’ve gotten the medium, but I can work this. Very versatile, staple wardrobe piece.
Comfy and Easy to style

A true high waist, perfect for wearing with a cool belt. Love the button fly so much. I’m going to size down next nuuly and buy ‘em! I went up last time because I don’t like my jeans super tight and usually need to do that.
These are my favorite jeans. The fit perfectly and accentuated al my curves.

links_reviews_title: Comfy but too distressed for me
links_reviews_text: These jeans are SO comfy! They feel like leggings. I would have worn them so much more if they were not as distressed which I could not see in the picture (or didn't read enough details!).
Ran small
I liked the location of where the rips were, but the pants don’t zip and are all buttons, and considering they were a Bit tight, it made me not want to wear them.
These are the perfect jeans. Not too tight, flattering, just enough rips and distressing. I should’ve kept them.
These are the perfect distressed black jeans. The high rise is honestly not the most comfortable but at the same time it really holds you in and gives you a great shape, especially in the rear.
stretch fit and very comfy! they run slightly large.
I loved the way this top looked on me! once everything opens i'm definitely wearing this for a night out!
This shirt wasn't anything special but it was nice for a girls night out! Tall girls beware - it's pretty short.
Really cute but it felt very worn in. It also felt like the bust was stretched out. Cute but didn't fit quite right in the bust area
Wore this as a bathing suit cover, going out shirt and flattering layer. The crop hits my petite frame at my smallest waist point, the deep v is cute and not too much in a small busted human.
Cutest little top. It is a deep v neck, I wore a body suit under it.
perfect without a bra, high waisted pants, and cute hat. loved this shirt so much.
Flowy and flirty. May need an undershirt if you mind showing off your chest as it can be revealing. I loved it.
Great for going out! Pretty cropped but good with high waisted jeans. Probably not ideal for bigger chests as it's very low cut.

Super cute top! Probably should have bought, but oh well. I wore it to an engagement party with high-waist jeans and booties. The top was cropped at the perfect length for my torso and the deep v wasn't as deep as I was expecting. I also have a fairly small chest so I didn't run into the issue of it being too tight like others with larger chests have mentioned. Wished I had other opportunities to wear it!

I don't normally wear urban outfitters so I wasn't accustomed to their sizing. While the shirt technically "fit" it was so short it ended up looking like some kind of bikini top. I actually gave it to my little sister to wear. She's a size 4 and the XL fit her really well as a slightly flowy blouse. I guess the pro is, if you are smaller and only larger sizes are available, you can definitely wear it!
Fit great and looked just how I expected!
Cute shirt but carries True Urban Outfitters quality.
I liked this top but the bust line was a little too small for me. Meant for smaller chest, not DD. Pretty pattern and shape.
Received a lot of compliments whenever I wore this. Quite difficult to wear without a cami underneath; very sheer x deep v neck.
Got so many compliments in this! Very versatile, can wear it to work or out to dinner. Such a pretty color too!
I really liked the idea of the shirt but if you have a chest the shirt sits awkward.

I am OBSESSED with this top and if my office was just slightly less conservative and I could get more wear out of it, I would have bought it. So effortless and everyone complimented it. And if your chest is small enough, you don't need a bra - which is always a plus! Love it!
I received so many compliments on this top! I paired it with jeans and heels to make for the perfect night out attire. Super flattering fit

Wore without a bra and it fit super dreamy! The sleeves fit my long arms well, and the shape of the shirt laid great over high-waisted jeans. Great for a low-key date night or a breezy daytime activity.
This is just not cute on. Weird cut and was really small in the waist.

Loved it so much I bought it. Very unique style. Runs true to size and was very flattering for me. Perfect for my trip to San Francisco in November, just a little bit of extra warmth on top of my T-shirt.
Loved this vest! It was teensy bit big but not a big deal at all.

I got a size up and prob didn’t need to but I wanted this jacket and they didn’t have my proper size available. Anywho- super fun to wear, boxy and over sized. I wore it with a hooded sweatshirt and leggings and I got so many compliments! I would def rent again.
I found myself wearing this jacket often. It has now become a staple in my wardrobe. If you have big hips I would suggest going up a size.

links_reviews_title: Cute, Comfy, and Easy to Wear
links_reviews_text: I was so surprised by this jacket! I picked it on a whim but wound up really loving it. I mostly wear an oversized denim jacket, so it was fun to have something more cropped, and the raw hem was really fun. It has just enough stretch to make the fit feel easy, too. I thought long and hard about keeping this one... :)
Print & color were great. Thought about buying it but it was a bit worn. Will definitely rent again!!!

Color is a bit brighter in person its a really pretty jacket just not really my style so I ended up not wearing it.
Twas fine

SO curte and got so many compliments

This skirt is everything and more! If I had gotten a small I would have kept it (next time!) for it was stunning in every way. I waited many months for it to come available and can’t wait to get it again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but maybe not for short people

Very pretty skirt. Fit great and made me feel like a ballerina. I wore with a fitted turtle neck shirt and moto jacket.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt, goes with a lot of colors. Simple but stands out!
links_reviews_text: You can wear it with pretty much any t-shirt color. You can wear it with flats or heels. It's very versatile.

So many compliments on this beautiful and fun skirt!

I was afraid of ordering the XXS because of the reviews but it fit just fine. I do have to say the patterns weren't quite what I expected, still pretty but more arts and crafty than you'd think. I chose to wear it high waisted over a turtleneck long sleeve and it went beautifully with it. I received lots of compliments with it.
Feel like the waist wasn’t the most flattering if you’re more hourglass, but had multiple people (especially male friends) compliment it. I’m tall and was still pretty long almost ankle length.
This skirt is absolutely gorgeous but the waist was just a bit too snug for me. If you're looking for a comfortable, looser fit, I recommend sizing up.
Such a cute skirt. I wore this for family photos. I wore it with a black turtleneck and black booties.

So I love this skirt but I'm a true 25 waist and didn't want the skirt to fall at the hip so got an XS hoping it wouldn't be too tight, but unfortunately it was maybe just a half inch too tight for my comfort so I didn't wear it out. I'll be trying the small!

I am normally an XS in elastic skirts like this but there was only an XXS and I've been wanting to try this skirt for the longest time so I Took a risk with the smaller size. I highly recommend this skirt!

Such a beautiful, unique skirt
Love it, I got so many compliments. Beautiful skirt
I love this! The pattern is unique but not so in your face. It goes well with pink or pale yellow tops to give it a nice balance of color. All around great choice.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt. I got to wear it to a couple events and it was so fun!
links_reviews_text: I wore it with a simple black camisole and pumps to my sister-in-law engagement party. Then I wore it with a black tshirt and flat with a jean jacket to a few restaurant opening events for work.

I loved this skirt. Tons and tons of compliments from my most fashionable co-workers. It stands out and was a very work appropriate length. Great statement piece.
The glitter waistband was super itchy but other than that this was such a cute skirt! I got so many compliments

Very cute in the picture and loved the color. Also, to be honest, they were very comfortable when I put them on but just not flattering. Very baggy in the hip area and never really laid flat.

These were fun! I would have worn them more if the weather had been warmer. Cute, flattering, comfortable, and easy to style! Heavily considered buying.
I was a little hesitant to rent these pants being 5'2 but they actually fit and were cute! I'd highly recommend wearing a heeled boot if you are my height but they were perfect for a work trip!
These are sooo freaking cute, but they did not fit over my voluminous behind. Luckily, my girlfriend was able to put them to work and she loved them! Beautiful color and wonderful length.
Really cute pants but definitely size down
New look - shocked they worked on me in a fear they'd make me look short. Loved em!

links_reviews_title: A little long but otherwise great
links_reviews_text: Stylish pants. Received many compliments. Note: it’s a pretty wide flare. A bit long for my petite frame but could pull off with heeled boots. Wish they carried in petite size.

These look flattering on the model, but are longer-crotched and looser in person, and as well a duller army-green color than the bright, mossy green in the photos. I'm 5'5", 125 lbs, with a true waist of 29" and a 38" hip. I wear a 27 or 28, and even sized down on these. Yet another bummer, Nuuly!
Got a lot of compliments on these pants. Can easily dress up or down.
Ran slightly loose but wore them quite a bit anyways!
A comfortable staple with a very wearable shape

These were really cute, the brand definitely runs small, as I usually wear a 29 and got a 30 in these and couldn't have gone smaller. They fit fine, but bunched a bit in the crotch area. I like the idea!
Great to style with a variety of different tops, fit was comfortable and easy to wear. I got a lot of compliments and felt great in them!
I wanted to love these. The waist was extremely tight. I loved the color and material. Wish I would have sized up.
Received multiple compliments when wearing these pants. Wore with tan sweater and heeled mules to work and then traveled in as well. Didn't wrinkle with a long flight. Would rent again. True to size
I really liked how these pants fit. I’m short so I wasn’t sure about the wide leg but they were very flattering and had a nice high waist.

Take the advice of the other reviewers and size down here, folks. I am anywhere between a 28 and 30 in jeans, so ordered the 28. Ran big, although with a belt they worked ok. Really like the cut and style of these pants though (they hit me mid-calf) and got heaps of compliments. Have actually just ordered a 27 in my next Nuuly 😀
These ran big and too long.

links_reviews_title: Looked so good, my husband bought them for me!
links_reviews_text: I wore this with everything ...t shirt, blouses, sweaters...tennis shoes, heels...really versatile and on trend...

links_reviews_title: Stylish pants, but they run a little big.
links_reviews_text: These are so cute and easy to style, however I'm usually a true to ize 27 and found these to be too big. I would order a size down next time.

These pants are a great color and fabric. The cut was flattering, especially for my petite frame. The hardest part for me about these was getting them over my butt. If you have a little more booty, they can be uncomfortably tight in the pelvis area - found them to ride up my crotch a little more than I would've wanted them to!

I loved these pants! I’m definitely renting again and possibly buy them. They fit great! I loved the wide leg. They weren’t long, which often happens with wide leg pants on me (I’m 5’5”). They looked cute with tees and sweaters. I could wear them with sneakers and any flats.
Didn’t look the best on me... wanted to love these but just couldn’t :(

These are super easy to dress up or down, they go with everything and are very comfortable. The waist is a bit tight when you first put them on (I needed to do a little shimmy to get them over my hips). They stretch out quite a bit, but not too much more of a relaxed fit (no saggy bottoms here)! I’m between a 25 and 26 so I’m glad I went with the 25. They’re longer then expected, but pants are normally too cropped on me so the length was perfect.

I found these to be the perfect fill-in for my everyday denim - a little bit more fun and easy to dress up or down. They are a true wide leg and there is a lot of material. Typically I'm between a size 25 and 26 and opted to size up to a 26, but unfortunately they stretch quite a bit throughout the day and it would have been wise to size down. Regardless, these pants are great quality and I'm tempted to keep!

Great utility pants! I got my normal size, but it's a little snug going over my hips. Fits great once they are on though! I'd recommend sizing up a size if you have some curves. I've gotten so many compliments wearing these and the dark olive color goes with everything!

The roomy fit and sturdy fabric in the notes are correct. Lately I've worn bottoms ranging from a 26 to a 28 so I got these in a 27. They fit fine but were overall a little loose. It made them really comfortable for sitting at work all day, but I generally like this style of pant to fit tighter throughout the waist. The quality is amazing and the color is as pictured.
I loved the idea of this top, but the fit was slightly off for me. I would say I have normal sized forearms but the cuff was too tight. I had to wear them unbuttoned for it to be comfortable.
I wanted to love this shirt but it didn't fit well and was very short on me.

I was so excited for this top! Sadly, the beading was an issue. They were hanging by a thread or missing completely. Not a big enough deal to stop me from wearing it out but wasn't confident wearing it somewhere nicer like to work as I had planned. Another thing I found weird was the sides. The sleeves are attached very low which means any time I moved my arms, the shirt lifted up showing my stomach. You could even see my sides when I wasn't moving, depending on how I stood/sat.
I really wanted to keep it but I didn’t give in. This was my favorite of the month. Worn with a tee and jeans. Did a little weird thing at the shoulders but it was so cute I didn’t care.

Some of the reviews commented how wide this top was, but I think that's part of the fashion statement. I wore it with high rise light was jeans and tan flat slip ons/mules and got so many compliments every time. Front tuck is a super cute look with this!
Should have listened to the other reviews but sometimes I just need to see for myself. Looks cute on the model in the picture, but when I tried it on, it wasn't flattering at all. Never wore it.

This is an interesting top. It’s pretty, and the one time I wore it I received several compliments, but it’s very awkward. The arm holes are very low and it’s shorter in the back than the front, this makes it hard to do anything that requires any kind of arm movement without accidentally flashing everyone around you. Like I said, it’s a cute top but in my option the cons kind of outweigh the pros.

Loved the details and overall styling of this top. I received lots of compliments. It was very cropped, looked much shorter on me than depicted in the pictures. Still loved, wore with a tank underneath and high waisted denim!

links_reviews_title: Did not fit in all the weird places
links_reviews_text: Sized down based on previous reviews but even then weird parts did not fit. There is so much fabric in the middle of this top. The sleeves are also not true sleeves but arm holes. The gold also sequins looks cheap in person.
I am usually a medium in tops, so I tried a small in this knowing that it would be a looser fit, but it was still too wide for me. Did not shape me at all like it does in the stock photo.
Love the style but there really is no fit to the shirt - the back is darling but it is best to wear something under it or an undergarment that won't show.

links_reviews_title: Weird fit, super tight around the waist
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this but I couldn't get it past my rib cage as it was so tight fitting aroud the waist. Waste of time ordering

I love midi and maxi dresses, especially for travel, this little girl was perfect. The double slit made it easy to walk in, length was perfect for me, the V does open a bit deeper than I thought it might but a little double stick tape to keep it from drifting too far did the trick.
It is pretty low cut, which is fine, but for larger chested women its a Whooooo Nelly moment. I added a top under it and it was fine, but spoilt the look a little
Loved this - my only concern is that I’m a size 8 and the large fit perfectly, which is sad that is the largest it goes. Love it - might buy in the future.

It’s perfect for an hour glass shape with an elastic band at the waist to show off your curves! It’s a little low on the chest so you might want to use a pin. It’s also super cute with jeans underneath- especially in the cold weather with some booties! Loved this piece.
Ordered a XS and wore as a part of my hippie costume on Halloween. Was super cute but the waist was SO small. Very tight and didn't loosen throughout the night.
I wore this dress a lot, but needed a hand to get it on. The waist band was very very tight and no zipper.

Wish I could have worn this dress more but it was so dang hot this month! (It's lightweight but not ideal for 90 degree days.) I see what people are saying about the waistband being small, but it was still true to size on me. Also the waistband was a lot wider than expected so it was pretty comfortable, just a little challenging to get on. Fun with a belt like pictured!
This piece is exactly what I expected, my only note is it's a bit longer through the torso which didn't fit all that great around my shoulders and bust area.

links_reviews_title: Too tight. Needed a size up.
links_reviews_text: The dress is great. Loved the slits on the side. Pretty color. However, it was tight and hard for me to get on. Once I got it on I was ok, but definitely would size up in the future.
Didn’t fit at all. Could barely get it on and off. Very disappointed I’m stuck with this item for the month because it’s unwearable.
This dress is gorgeous!!! It ran tight around the diaphragm area so I wouldn’t recommend wearing this for a long time because it does get uncomfortable. Beauty is pain though, am I right?
Beautiful print, soft fabric for these really hot days

links_reviews_title: Amazing pattern mix, fits great, got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress was out of my comfort zone but I loved wearing it. Length was perfect and I was able to wear it with flats, it has two slits which give a greater walking rage without falling (my problem with maxi dresses). It fits true to size, however I must say that the elastic at the waist felt a little tight on my ribcage.

links_reviews_title: Great print but a bit tight
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and was able to make it work but the elastic waist band is very tight. I got a Medium but would have liked a Large but then not sure the top would have fit right. The sleeves, length and print were all perfect!
Lovely dress but fit me too tightly to wear comfortably. Should have sized up.

I'm usually a size small or medium in dresses. I tried this dress on and the bust/waist band was almost impossible to get over my shoulders. There's no zipper to zip yourself up - you just pulled it over your head. After struggling to get it on, the neckline was SO low while the bust/waist band was SO tight. In the photos it looks like it would stretch, but it does not. Also, the bust/waist band sat on my ribs. I think it's meant to sit on my waist, but I could've pull it down there. Overall, pretty disappointed with this.

This fit a little large, but it was the silkiest and comfy thing ever!! The straps took a little figuring out, it's better if you tie the top strap to the opposite bottom strap. It comes out way sexier and shows off all the right places, got quite a few compliments! I just sent it back an hour ago and I kind of regret not buying it now.
I really wanted to love this dress, but the fit was just wonky. There were so many strings and I could not manage to fit properly around my rib cage.
Does not fit right at all
The pattern and colors are gorgeous. It is quite thin. Not sheer, just very thin. There are several ways to tie the straps. It’s a great beach/vacation/summer dress.

I took this on a trip to Mexico and never actually wore it despite trying it on twice. I just felt it was too revealing and the back was cut super low. It would probably be better for a taller woman with a bigger chest area.
Loved it. Got instant compliments from my husband. Packed it for trip to Antigua, and it hung out really well. Great summer maxi!!

i needed a flowy maxi dress i could bring on my beach vacation and this was it. loved the pattern and low cut back. docked one star because the string ties were so long and a little complicated to get on
I wore this on my honeymoon and it was so flattering! I usually wear a size small in FP and this fit perfectly! Love it
Got this as a backup for a wedding but wore a different day to the botanical gardens. super flowy and more casual than fancy
Loved this super flowy maxi. Super sexy back that's great for the beach!

links_reviews_title: Sexy, flowy, and beautiful on any body!
links_reviews_text: This maxi has material that was smooth and soft—felt like butter! The backless look made it sexy for evening but you could pull this off in the day. The strings to tie everything together seem confusing but not hard to get working... looks really bohemian when you’re done.
Got a ton of compliments! Comfortable too.
It’s gorgeous and flattering, it was my favorite piece!
I liked it just didn't have an occasion to wear it.

I wore this dress all the time! In the city, at the beach, by the pool, to work! It was the dress for all occasions and the material felt so smooth. I was a little concerned when I initially selected this item that the back cut would drop too low to be appropriate, but it ended up hitting mid-lower back. Very cute and fun summer dress that will leave you showered in compliments.

I was unable to wear these because of how small they were. Very small in the waist. I rented the medium as I am a 27 in jeans but they were uncomfortably tight. The pants are a bit cropped. I am 5’7” and they just looked like high waters. Pants are cute the fit is just off.

These were a little snug in the waist and the slit goes all the way up the leg in case you are considering them for day to day. My husband liked them, but next time I’d save them for the beach, pool or lake since they split high up when you sit down. Otherwise I really liked them
flowy, fun, loved them! True that they are a little tight (which is kind of nice for moving around b/c the slits are long!) so if you are half size size up. I'm usually XS/S in pants and S was fine

links_reviews_title: Good for the beach, runs small
links_reviews_text: Wore them in FL during a wedding weekend. The slit does go all of the way up, so beware of that. They were a good, fun fabric though and didn't wrinkle during the travel. The waistband was pretty tight, so def size up.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy, the tassle hem didn't look the best
links_reviews_text: Styled with a crop top also from Nuuly and was obsessed with the outfit. Perfect for Mexico because they were breezy and let tons of air in. It was a little challenging to sit down in them without showing too much skin, and the legs would drag on the floor. Lastly, there's really beautiful tasseling on the hem- but it was scrunched up and messy (like it had been washed, which is fine by me!). It didn't really affect anything, All I'd need to do was iron them straight but didn't have time.
these pants are super cute, but definitely size up because they were much tighter at the waist than what I was expecting so I couldn't wear them :(
I sized up and these pants were unfortunately still too small for my wide hips. I’d definitely recommend sizing up if you’re bigger on the bottom at all as there’s not much give in the material.
Truly versatile vacation pants. Brought on my trip to Brazil...wore them out, to the beach, on a boat...love these and wouldn’t hesitate to buy them.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but fit was off
links_reviews_text: The pants were a great style, but note that the slit goes all the way to the waistband so these aren't appropriate for everywhere. But my bigger issue was that I got them in a medium, and the waistband was *so tight* on my waist I never wore them, too uncomfortable. I wear a 4/6 in pants, so medium should have been just fine, especially for elastic waist!

Loved these pants: the way they flow, the color, material, cut, etc. But the elastic waistband is just a tad too tight. I'm a size 27 waist and after an hour of wearing the Small, the waist became too uncomfortable. Will try again sometime in a Medium.
Fits as expected. Petite friendly
Narrow in the waist

Very cute loose look on the model but the pants didn't look as loose and free as I liked on me. I'm curvy and have big thighs and usually a size L in bottoms whereas my mom and younger sister have smaller thighs than me so I let them wear it! They loved it and looked very cute on them. My advice would be to maybe try sizing up if you want the loose look!
It’s a very pretty dress, but the fabric is super thin and cheap looking.

I loved this dress so much that I bought it. It’s perfect for maternity, but I think it will be great after my baby is born too. It’s very comfortable. The fit is flattering. And I received a ton of compliments.
wore to a baby shower and it was cute, but didn't need to keep it.
LOVE. Might keep. Just wish it covered that area between my upper boob and armpit a little better. Very forgiving fit and material.
This would have been a cute dress but it ran too small in the bust and hips.

I wanted to love this dress so badly. It fit me perfectly but it was very unflattering if you have any kind of stomach. I'm about an 8 size in dresses and got a medium. Everything fit perfectly and its very comfortable but it does not do any wonders if you have a stomach. I couldn't pull myself to try and wear it.

I love this dress. its gonna be so hard to send it back. So cute and flowy and simple. I ordered an XS and the top part has a bit of room (Im a 32B/C). not really tight at all in any part like I was expecting but still so so cute
This was my most favorite dress in the shipment. So comfortable and the fit was perfect including the length. I wore several times with sneakers, booties and heels and it all complimented.

I really wanted to like this because I love the stretchy material, but unfortunately, it just wasn't flattering on me. I can't quite put my finger on why; maybe it was too stretchy in the wrong places.... But it is cute & might work better on a different body type
LOVED this dress. I wore it to work, and on vacation in Italy. It is so flattering—and while I’m usually a M the S fit me perfectly. Loved the material, not see-through, and simply beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The most adorable and comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: This was my favorite item in this month's Nuuly! It was beyond comfortable. I wore day to night. The only downside is that the waist dropped a bit, feel like it is designed for someone with a longer torso, perhaps 5'8" or taller. It still fit, just seemed a bit baggy.
Wore this one twice! Loved the stretchy top and the flowy skirt. Easy to wear and very comfortable! True to size! I wore a large.
Easy to wear for multiple occasions

Absolutely love this dress. Flutter sleeves, smocking, and length are all very flattering. Print is gorgeous, photos don’t do it justice. Could be dressed up, but I wore it to work with flats and a jean jacket. Best of all, it’s sooo comfortable! Also very stretchy and forgiving, good for a baby bump!
Wore this a handful of times and loved it! A little larger in the waist than I would have liked but overall it was perfect for the Summer. Very comfortable but not sure I would purchase!
I loved this dress. I received so many complements every time I wore it. Very comfortable, not see through.

I sized up on this one and wish that I hadn't as the top part of the dress didn't fit well. If you are petite and short-waisted I'm not sure if the fit of this dress will suit as I found the biggest issue with the proportions on the top of the dress & am not sure if the smaller size would have helped or not.

This dress is amazing and my favorite item from my first Nuuly haul! I received so many compliments on it. It's super comfortable and adorable on. I usually wear a small but only the XS was available - it ended up fitting me well since the top part is stretchy.

I. LOVE. THIS. DRESS. First off, it's so cute and feminine and you feel like you should go on an instrammable picnic while you're wearing it. Secondly, it's incredibly comfortable with the stretch in the bodice. The nice thing about this part too is that sizing with this dress is super flexible. I think the size L would fit someone who wears a size XXL and I also think it could fit a size M. I would say it's technically true to size, but if you're inbetween sizes, I recommend sizing down because there's enough stretch that it will work!

BIG BIG fan of this dress! One of my favs. I even wore it to travel in and I NEVER travel in dresses! (exclusively leggings until now!!) It was really comfortable and lightweight, even when I wore it in the blazing sun of south Texas. I am normally a S but they were out so I got an XS and it fit great! (Not sure if it runs big, I think the smocking just has a lot of give.)
This dress is so comfortable! The top is stretchy and fitted, and the bottom is beautiful and flowy. I have worn it to work and out on a date, so it's a great multipurpose dress!
This dress is perfect for all occasions! I wore it to work and to a visit to The MET one Sunday. It also can be dressed up for a nicer event. It’s stretchy and has a lining so it’s not see-through.
I love this dress! It fits so well and is incredibly comfortable. Will definitely be wearing multiple times!
Love how the fit of this dress seems to work on all different body styles and heights! It’s a great dress for a casual summer day.

Love this dress! I'm petite and 20 weeks pregnant so finding dresses that are comfortable, cute and flattering can be a challenge ... this dress checks all 3 boxes. I sized up 1 size from my pre-pregnancy size. The smocking through the torso would definitely accommodate a bigger belly if you're farther along in your pregnancy. I wore this for brunch with friends and to work and got a bunch of compliments both times. I would definitely rent this again next summer post pregnancy in my normal size.

Wore this dress to a fancy brunch and it was PERFECT. It hugged my figure and was very flattering but conservative. It also hid my tummy bulge even though it was figure hugging. Really hit in the right spots.
I loved this dress but it never warmed up enough on the East coast enough for me to wear it. I’ll rent it again in the Spring/Summer.

Cute but it was too long for me. It fit well though but needed some ironing to look good and crisp. I don’t mind dresses or skirts over the knee but it was at the awkward length where it wasn’t flattering (I’m short too so it’s difficult to find the right flattering length) I might’ve given it more stars if I had ordered during summertime because I had to wear this with a sweater so it covered up the pretty ruffles at the shoulders.
Loved the top of this dress and the star pattern. I wish the slip went all the way to the bottom because you can see where it ends around your knees. Wore this for vacation in Florida.
Cute dress, but unfortunately it didn't fit me right. I typically wear a small in dress, but got this in a medium to accommodate my larger hips and bum and it still was tight on my lower half.

Only tried it on and didn't wear it out because it didn't fit my body type well. I am smaller on top and have somewhat wider hips so the top ended up being a bit big while the hips were tight...NOT a good look. Would be super cute on someone with a more hourglass figure.
I LOVE this dress but I'm so glad I sized up. It runs really small, especially in the bust area. I'm usually a M, but went with L and it's perfect.
Lots of compliments! Loved this. Just a little fitted so wish I sized up!

I loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. The ties in the back help to synch in and define your waist. And while it's lower cut than something I would normally wear, I didn't feel exposed. I was able to wear a regular bra with it that had the same lower notch.

links_reviews_title: Cute but the sleeves are annoying
links_reviews_text: Loved how the dress looked but the tie sleeves are very restricting. I tried to wear it out a few times but decided against it since i didn’t want to have to bother with the sleeves.
I got the Small however it was so big on :(

links_reviews_title: Cute but don't plan on using your arms
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little big in the bust on me but otherwise fit fine. The ties on the arms are super cute but I had trouble tying them by myself and they limit arm movement quite a bit when the dress was on.

links_reviews_title: RSVP to that Summer Garden Party
links_reviews_text: LOVED this number. It is perfect for a summer soiree. I liked that the straps were adjustable both on the arms and over the shoulders so that I could fit it to me. It felt a little snug in the waist, but I would still keep this size, which was TTS for me. It hit me a little below mid-shin and has pockets - YES. The color is true to the pictures. A yes for me!

I wanted to wear this for easter, but I only got to wear it once before social distancing drove me inside :). I got the XS, but I wish I had gotten the small because the bodice fits snugly. My picture has a filter on it, its much more blue :)

Probably the cutest jump suit I have ever worn and the best thing I have ever rented from here. Sadly I read a review to size up and it's just a little too loose in some areas. I would NOT size up, I think my normal size medium would have been perfect!
Really cute romper. Runs small in the waste area. But otherwise really flattering.
This jumpsuit will make you feel like Zoe Deschanel in the most magical way. I only wish it had pockets! The ruffles on the sleeves are so freaking adorable.
Unfortunately it was too tight in the chest area. I normally wear medium so would have needed ro size up. Print is gorgeous. The top ruffles are a bit large but could have worked.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for petite ladies like myself
links_reviews_text: This item is very cute however, if you are petite (I'm 5'0 for reference) this will not work. Because this hit the model well above the ankle, I figured it could work for me length-wise but that was not the case. While the length was fine, the torso portion was way too long and did not hit me in the right places. That said, if you are of the right height, this is just darling!
super cute but runs small - size up!

links_reviews_title: Too Tight on Top, Too Big on the Bottom, but Cute
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this jumpsuit, and to be honest I didn't hate it, but it wasn't great either. I ordered a size small because I am often concerned about the length in jumpsuits. The top portion was very very tight on my ribcage, which surprised me because I was already sizing up and I am very narrow up top. The bottom half was a very wide and loose fit and honestly probably looked too big. I couldn't imagine sizing down though as the top half was so tight. This also had a drag in the crotch, and the straps would sometimes fall down, indicating it was too long, which also surprised me considering I am almost 5'8". Overall cute enough to get away with it, but odd fit, and definitely would not recommend if you are petite.

I sized up due to the other reviews and I'm glad that I did. I typically wear a small, but I rented a medium and this style fit me well. The jumpsuit is made of cotton and has a lining that goes down to your mid-thighs, like shorts. The print looks a bit like polka dots from the photo image, but the print is actually small daisy's.

links_reviews_title: Adorable and perfect for summer. I have broad shoulders and it minimized them rather than accentuate them as expected.
links_reviews_text: Work with Adidas white shelltops

This jumpsuit was great for work, for a trip the park, for all the things! I liked the cropped leg a lot, it looks v cute with high-tops and heels. The fit was a bit weird, but I made it work. The fit runs small, but the torso is long, and the fabric does NOT stretch. If I had went up a size, it would have been perfect!

Really cute but it runs small. Surprisingly well fitting length wise in the body which is sometimes hard for being taller and wearing jumpsuits. The straps were maybe a little long, but it’s really cute! May try it in a size up next month!
super cute, love the back. unfortunately, the waist was too tight.
Nice print but very frumpy and unflattering
I have never tried the mid-length, but it I really liked this dress and it worked great!

I fell in love with this dress because of the fabric and the back, but the only reason I am not keeping it is I felt it was a bit of an awkward cut. It felt like the front had, at the same time, too much fabric but also squished my boobs.
Dress was 1-2 sizes too large up top.

links_reviews_title: It's a cute dress - I wore it once but didn't LOVE LOVE it.
links_reviews_text: Casual dress and wore it with beige flats and an armful of bracelets. The open back adds a nice touch that might not make it suitable for work but it's cute.
Wore this dress a couple of times. Cute with flats and espadrilles. Fit was true to size. Loved the pockets and absolutely loved the back details!

Loved this so much I kept finding reasons to wear it! I got non-stop compliments at work and it was the perfect dress for a summer dinner date. Comfortable, flattering and gorgeous print. Thinking I have to buy this one.
Fits as expected. Size up for a roomier fit in the waist. Maxi length on petite

This caught my eye as I was browsing! It looks a lot better on the model than it did on me though! The medium was pretty big - and you can actually tie the back to make it tighter, but that made the neckline come up way too high and ultimately wasn't that flattering. There's also quite a bit of fabric on the bottom half, which doesn't ever really flatter my figure.
Super cute! Bright color kept me from outfit repeating too much while I had it :)
Almost came close to keeping this and that right there says a lot for me! It almost feels vintage! The lace is stunning.
You can see right through it

links_reviews_title: Fit well and all cute! Would order again!
links_reviews_text: Wore with jeans and clogs. Wore it to work. Got lots of compliments. A bit oversized but in a good way!
This is a pretty blouse. It runs big, but that's the style. I didn't love it or hate it. I got it for a trip to Mexico - but, even there, I just wore it once. Maybe it's just not my style.
Wore with cutoffs to a pool party. Lots of compliments. Beware though, it’s billowy
This shirt is a gorgeous pop of pink! It's a very saturated tone that would look good on anyone! Got tons of compliments and great quality! Didn't keep because of price but loved getting to wear it.
Not a fan of the color, fit, cut or fabric. 0 stars if I could.

links_reviews_title: A great shirt to spice up your wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: This pink shirt is such a fun shirt to have in your closet. I typically wear a Small but I ordered this shirt in a Medium since there were no Smalls available. I'm not sure how the Small would have fit, but I'm very happy with the Medium size. I've worn this shirt with jean shorts and sandals on the weekend, and jeans and block heels to work. links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, but did not wear it
links_reviews_text: This dress has a lot of positives: the material is stretchy enough that it's flattering but also holds you in, the double leg slit is necessary since this dress would otherwise have no movement. Ultimately, I did not end up wearing this dress. I would style it with a mid calf heeled boot, or a black heel. Can be dressed up or down. I am a 36C and I feel like if you have a bigger chest than me this may stretch out too much and not work.

I took a risk going with the M/L, but I'm usually a size 8 in pants and a Small/XS up top, so didn't want this dress to be too small on bottom. I thought this could be a fun maxi that I wear with booties and a leather jacket on the weekend but it's really more appropriate for an "event" as the name "Gala" suggests.
Beautiful dress, fits like a glove, sexy an fun.
